Timecodes 00:00:00 â€“ Intro 00:02:26 â€“ Difference between Array and Set? 00:04:38 â€“ What does #available do? 00:07:32 â€“ How do you make a network request? 00:09:51 â€“ Why is immutability important? 00:15:17 â€“ What does UIVisualEffectView? 00:17:59 â€“ Main differences between classes and structs? 00:20:59 â€“ Swift Package Manager, CocoaPods, Carthage 00:24:49 â€“ What is CGAffineTransform? 00:28:25 â€“ Swift vs ObjC 00:31:57 â€“ StoreKit 00:35:24 â€“ Differences between XIBs and storyboards? 00:38:52 â€“ Memory management in Swift 00:41:09 â€“ Dealing with crashes 00:45:20 â€“ NSAttributedString 00:48:02 â€“ How would you explain ARC? 00:51:18 â€“ Differences between CloudKit and CoreData? 00:53:04 â€“ What's the purpose of GameplayKit? 00:55:26 â€“ How do you list files in a directory? 00:56:41 â€“ What's the purpose of UIActivityViewController? 00:59:36 â€“ Storyboards vs code 01:01:44 â€“ What's a sensible minimum iOS deployment target? 01:07:53 â€“ Difference between String? and String! 01:10:42 â€“ Difference between @IBOutlet and @IBAction 01:12:37 â€“ CollectionView vs TableView 01:14:46 â€“Contribution to open source 01:18:46 â€“ Difference between Float, Double and CGFloat 01:21:34 â€“ UIColor 01:23:00 â€“ defer keyword 01:25:47 â€“ How do you identify and resolve battery life issues? 01:28:57 â€“ What's the purpose of IBDesignable 01:32:00 â€“ Outro
